subject: Re: Thanks for your recent refinance loan request, we accepted your refinance debt request
body:
Your credit doesn't matter to us!
If you OWN real estate and want IMMEDIATE money to spend ANY way you like, or simply need to LOWER your current payments by a third or more, here is our deal we can offer you THIS EVENING (hurry, this deal will expire TODAY):
$356,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest current payments!
Hurry, when best deal is gone, it is gone. Simply fill out this easy form... 
Don't worry about approval, your credit history will not disqualify you!
http://zodqunoot.com/
